subject: RE: [junit] Re: How to test private methods in a class.
msgSnippet: ... True. Once you also have a, say, CustomerSearchQueryBuilder, it won t be too hard to find the similarities and making building a stronger abstraction by
messageBody:
> But this QueryBuilder class looks for me more like
> FlightSearchQueryBuilder, as it doesn't provide any useful
> functionality for any places other
> then presented 'search' method.

True. Once you also have a, say, CustomerSearchQueryBuilder, it won't be too
hard to find the similarities and making building a stronger abstraction by
removing the duplication.

Cheers, Ilja
